Prada

The brand was founded in 1913 by Mario Prada, Miuccia’s grandfather, in Milan. Located in the prestigious Galleria Vittorio Emanuele II, Prada was an exclusive, stylish store selling luggage, accessories and luxury goods, in fine materials and of sophisticated workmanship. Miuccia Prada and Patrizio Bertelli started working together in the late 70’s, laying the foundations of the international expansion that was to come.
Today, Prada offers men’s and women’s leather goods, clothing and footwear, combining contemporary, cutting-edge sophistication with one-of-a-kind, sublimely-crafted products, also operating in the eyewear and fragrance sectors.

Prada for women

The Prada brand was born back in 1913 when brothers Mario and Martino opened an elegant and classy boutique in Milan. The store was located in Galleria del Duomo, and the sign outside read Fratelli Prada: from the window, you could see an array of suitcases, trunks, beauty cases and luxury travel luggage. After the ups and downs caused by two world wars, Prada rose to the top thanks to Mario's granddaughter, Miuccia Prada, who in the 70s elevated the brand to very high levels. After founding Miu Miu in 1992, a brand dedicated to young people, experimentation and the most avant-garde fusions, today Prada is a union of artistic ideas between Miuccia and Patrizio Bertelli, company CEO.

Prada collection

Essential style with clean and sober lines, minimal chic: such as the iconic short kid mohair jacket which is perfect worn with a pair of high-waisted tuxedo trousers for a mannish and androgynous style. The cropped shirt of the same design that reveals the midriff is perfect with an empire skirt and a pair of powder blue mom jeans. Keeping in line with the less is more and minimalist trend, the short cashmere sweater is a truly chic and feminine garment, perfect matched with the polka dot skirt of the same collection. This small crop top with cardigan style sleeves and buttons is a real precious gem in the Prada knitwear collection, it’s original and irresistible. The short black cashmere cardigan with long sleeves and the crop top are part of the same line.

Prada women's tops

Mauve, powder blue and wisteria are the trendiest colours of the season, as the Pantone website suggests. Among the unique Prada pieces of the new collection, there is the tulle cardigan with sequins that is a true show stopper, the real star of the line. Ethereal and ultra-sparkly, it floods the outfit with light and acts as a weightless and futuristic veil: only for wow outfits! The wisteria and mauve crêpe de chine shirt is light as a feather, exquisitely retro and truly feminine.

Prada women's bags

Prada offers a collection of bags and accessories for women that are a true source of pure luminosity for refined and creative outfits. Gorgeous and sparkly mesh bags with sequins, available in various sizes and colours, from powder pink to wisteria, white to black! For a simpler yet bold and ultra-feminine look, the brushed leather Cleo bag is classy and spellbinding. An icon of the Prada brand, available in many shades, from cherry red to total black.

Prada women's shoes

The Prada fashion collections offer loafers and lace-ups that seem to sparkle like Cinderella's shoes, but also pumps and slingback shoes made to shine all night long. From Cinderella to the witches of the Wizard of Oz and the protagonist Dorothy, with shoes that cast a spell: slingbacks in metallic leather, satin sandals with crystals, Mary Janes with an extremely sparkly strap, this is Prada’s recipe to success, creating shoes fit for a fairy. Another hit are the mannish loafers and the lace-ups in brushed leather, satin and crystals, precious and shiny details for a woman who loves to play with light and with her own personality. The Prada Milano collection is designed for a woman of character, a true fashion connoisseur who likes to experiment every day. The union between Made in Italy and international innovation, Italian design and avant-garde solutions makes for a collection that bursts with creativity... always for a classy woman.
